tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Silverwood - Unknown Caller - Starring Bree Essrig, Spencer Garrett and Justin Giddings
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Abandoned, angry and lonely? Her name is Alex. For more Bree - http://www.youtube.com/breeessrig FEATURED SONGS: "Saboteur" by The Epilogues and "Top of the World" by Schoolboy FACEBOOK http://on.fb.me/e7ru5s
6 months ago, Ale'x mother abandoned her and her father. No note, no goodbye. Only a voicemail. BlackBoxTV Presents: Unknown Caller
Starring: Bree Essrig Spencer Garrett Justin Giddings
Score by Brandon Roberts
CREDITS for this Episode: http://imdb.to/OPeGyg
What is "BlackBoxTV: Silverwood" ?
"BlackBoxTV: Silverwood" is a Horror, Science Fiction and Thriller Series that features stand-alone, scripted episodes that all take place if the town of Silverwood, California. Inspired by "The Twilight Zone" "Outer Limits" "Tales from The Crypt" and the works of Stephen King, Wes Craven, Ray Bradbury, H.P. Lovecraft, John Carpenter, Richard Kelly and more.
Description Tags: "horror movies" "horror movies 2012" "horror movies 2011" "horror films" "scary stories" "scary movies" "scary videos" "sci fi" "sci fi movies" "sci fi shows" "sci-fi" "science fiction" "web series"

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: do all there videos take﻿ place in silverwood
That was Crazy good XD﻿
Wowwwwww﻿ this actually brought tears to my eyes. Amazing!
the﻿ dad is really sick
Goosebumps, omg. <3﻿
This is soooooo﻿ ADDICTING!!!!!
da﻿ fuq?
alot do, its like a series. i think theres a reason for it. ﻿

I had a bit of a problem with he father's reaction to the first texts ("If your mom wanted to reach us, she would") and the daughter's reaction to his reaction (why wouldn't she say, "But that's what this is!"? And why would she assume her﻿ mom left them instead of thinking that she was taken or harmed or killed, especially since she left no note and said nothing?). *But* overall I thought it was great.
The 111s in the first text were particularly terrifying for some reason.
holy shit....i﻿ love it!!!
This made me cry! This was amazing! Cheers to﻿ BlackBoxtv :)
Bree is a brilliant﻿ actress! The story is also brilliant!
@ThatsMrFrank it is kind﻿ of like the R.L Stine series 'Fear St.' it's a series of different stories, all taking place on one street.
I've been waiting on the﻿ one with Bree to be uploaded since I saw the preview. I knew it would be good, but this was beyond my expectations. This one is my favorite. Great job. ((:
woah greg﻿ from bite me
Best episode ever﻿ loved it :'(kind made meh cry
I got chills... Damn. Good job﻿ BlackBox!
That was﻿ amazing
Her﻿ ghost
wish that was a movie:,(﻿
it was unknown so﻿ you couldn't call it
Dude﻿ that was intense
I would cuddle her so﻿ hard
this is on some pretty lil liars type﻿ shit
